errors.title: Document locked / In use by another user
symptoms: Error appears when trying to post goods receipt
Can't edit or save the document
causes: Another device/session has the document open
System didn’t finish a previous save
steps: Back out to the main menu and save any work.
On the Zebra, close SAP (Menu → Exit) then reopen.
Search to see if the doc was already posted (by invoice/delivery).
Wait 2–5 minutes and try again.
If it persists, log out on other devices or ask a lead to clear the lock.

errors.title: Corrupt link / Shortcut opens wrong menu
symptoms: Tapping DSD/DC link does nothing or opens a blank screen
steps: Restart the Zebra (hold power → Restart).
Open SAP from the apps list (not the old shortcut).
Navigate to the correct menu and create a fresh shortcut.
If it returns, report to IT with the device number.

errors.title: Zebra handheld frozen / slow
symptoms: Screen stuck, scans delayed, app not responding
steps: Close background apps and relaunch SAP.
Toggle Wi-Fi off/on near the backroom AP.
Restart the device.
If frequent, note time/location and escalate.

errors.title: DC Receiving: items stay yellow after scan
symptoms: After scanning pallets, some items remain yellow
steps: Press F12 to show pending items.
Re-scan the pallet label for the yellow item(s).
Cross-check counts with the Stop Manifest.
If short/damaged, record it and inform a supervisor.
Post only what you received; keep paperwork with notes.

errors.title: Missing invoice at delivery
causes: Vendor forgot to print / left it in truck
steps: Ask the driver to provide a copy or email/fax.
If unavailable, document delivery details and pallet counts.
Hold posting until invoice arrives (unless policy allows temp entry).
File notes with date/time and vendor contact.
errors.notes: Follow local policy for temporary entries and POD.

errors.title: Invoice already exists / duplicate
symptoms: System says invoice number already used
steps: Search for an existing doc by invoice/vendor/date.
If already posted, stop—file paperwork and mark duplicate.
If not posted, verify digits and re-enter.
Escalate if still uncertain.
